name: Cuberot
description:
Play as a tiny creature in an unknown place where you rotate the world as you traverse through the level. Use keys and buttons to unlock the path and see what lies ahead in the uncharted area.

Supports keyboard and Xbox controller.

Design - Kevin Andersson - @AnderssonKev
Art & Animation - Martin Rasmusson - @nenqu
Programming - Rasmus Jarl - @RazeDux
